title: Were any codicils made to the will?
question: Were any codicils made to the will?
paragraph1: A codicil is a legal document that‘s a supplement to a will. Codicils list changes and updates to a will and are signed and witnessed the same way as a will.
paragraph2: Check if a codicil is attached to the will, or they may be loose pages. The word ‘codicil’ may be at the top of the page.

codicils.required: Select ‘yes’ if there‘s at least 1 codicil
